short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You like reading stories on Internet? You will love our extension: you can simply select text & search similar stories on IIWIARS!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You like family drama stories, bridezilla stories or even mother-in-law stories? You will like our extension!

Discover related stories effortlessly with the "Search Similar Stories" Chrome extension. Simply select any text on a webpage, right-click, and choose "Search similar stories" from the context menu. This extension sends the selected text to an API, retrieves related stories, and opens the result in a new tab. Enhance your browsing experience by quickly finding more content that interests you.

Features:

- Easy to Use: Right-click on any selected text to search for similar stories.
- Seamless Integration: Opens the search results in a new tab for uninterrupted browsing.
- Efficient: Quickly fetches related stories based on the selected text.

How to Use:

- Highlight the text you want to search for similar stories.
- Right-click and select "Search similar stories" from the context menu.
- A new tab will open with the search results.
